channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Marni's sentimental guide to giving the past a presence in our homes
item.description: Over the years, I have earned the reputation as the stuff police. I am forever nagging you to purge, declutter, toss, donate, edit, dump, oust, clear, lighten up and let go. But today, sit down, I am going to sentimentally suggest that some old things you should keep.

item.title: Killer set for execution 43 years after Bay County slaying
item.description: TALLAHASSEE — More than 43 years after Janet White was abducted from a Bay County insurance office and murdered, Gov. Ron DeSantis on Friday signed a death warrant for convicted killer Kayle Barrington Bates.

item.title: What is PSLF, how does it work? What we know about it's…
item.description: If you benefit from student loan forgiveness in the U.S., you may have to start paying interest again soon. As the Trump Administration’s crackdown on the Department of Education continues, around eight million borrowers will have to resume paying interestafter a year of forgiveness.

item.title: Using 'Florida' as a password? So are nearly 900,000…
item.description: You may love your state and be fiercely proud of it, but please don't use "Florida" as a password.

item.title: College leaders await NIL regulation. Trump's…
item.description: Questions about whether PresidentDonald Trumpwill issue an executive order to addressname, image and likeness standardsin college sports after media reports surfaced he was working on one earlier this week.

item.title: Free, self-serve Sarasota County sandbag locations open Saturday
item.description: Sarasota County is offering free, voluntary, self-service sandbag locations this Saturday, July 19, to help residents in protecting their homes and property from potential flooding as they prepare for storms this hurricane season.

item.title: Elite recruits at Booker ready to lead last state title run as group
item.description: For most programs, a 10-4 finish with a berth in the state semifinals would be a season to hang your laurels on. Back-to-back regional championships are especially difficult, and a feat most programs in the state have never and likely will never accomplish.
